articles.author: Amanda Hoover, Pranav Dixit
articles.title: Welcome to Silicon Valley's winner-take-all era - Business Insider
articles.description: From Meta to Microsoft, generative AI is accelerating Big Tech's salary divide.
articles.content: Hundred-million-dollar pay packages aren't just for the Shohei Ohtanis and Cristiano Ronaldos of the world anymore. In Silicon Valley, nine-figure pay days are reportedly now being floated to the wor… [+7786 chars]
